synopsis.text: Follows the life of Tsukasa, an ordinary salaryman, who finds himself in the crosshairs of malevolent demons. His unlikely savior comes in the form of Shizuri, a prodigious kunoichi with a peculiar off-duty persona: an indolent otaku NEET. As gratitude for her protection, Tsukasa utilizes his exceptional homemaking abilities to indulge Shizuri's otaku lifestyle. The two find themselves in an unconventional living arrangement, blending thrilling combat missions with the mundane realities of everyday life. Prepare for an eccentric blend of action and comedy in this unique tale.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
